extendedIngredients.name: cherries
extendedIngredients.original: 1/2 cup coarsely chopped dried Montmorency tart cherries
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1/2 cup coarsely chopped dried Montmorency tart cherries
extendedIngredients.originalName: coarsely chopped dried Montmorency tart cherries

title: Blender Peanut Butter with Dried Tart Cherries
instructions:
Add peanuts and salt to a high speed blender (or powerful food processor). Pulse a few times to get started, then put on high speed for 20 seconds. Stop, stir all the way to the bottom, and return to high speed for 20 seconds. Add oil, then return to high speed. Add this point the peanuts should be breaking down and churning. Continue to blend until smooth and creamy. 
Add tart cherries and pulse several times to incorporate, then mix on high speed for 10 seconds. Store in a jar, in the refrigerator.

steps.step: Add peanuts and salt to a high speed blender (or powerful food processor). Pulse a few times to get started, then put on high speed for 20 seconds. Stop, stir all the way to the bottom, and return to high speed for 20 seconds.
Add oil, then return to high speed.
Add this point the peanuts should be breaking down and churning. Continue to blend until smooth and creamy.
Add tart cherries and pulse several times to incorporate, then mix on high speed for 10 seconds. Store in a jar, in the refrigerator.
